name: Five Nights at Nikocado's 2: Cheese Breach
name_original: Five Nights at Nikocado's 2: Cheese Breach
description:
Welcome to Nikocado Avocado's Mega Muk-Plex! 🥑🗿

This is the 2nd game of the "Nikocado" trilogy. This time, we're back with a fully 3D game with thrilling horror action! And yes, we didn't forget to add a lot of memes...

(The game has multiplayer feature, scroll down to learn more...)

Single-player Features:

  • 5 free-to-play nights.
  • New characters: Ben and Freddy.
  • You can feed Nikocado.
  • Nikocado has an electric scooter.
  • The game is 10x more spookier than the previous game.
  • There are 5 nights with new features added each night!
  • This is the first ever 3D multiplayer FNaF fan-game.
  • Graphics that resemble the PSX era

Controls & How to play:

  • Use the "left mouse button" to do anything.
  • W,A,S,D controls for movement.
  • SPACE to jump.
  • Using the cheeseburger makes Nikocado go away.
Multiplayer version of the game can be downloaded by donating only $1.69 👌😎

 We had to make the multiplayer feature paid, because projects like this take a lot of effort to develop in such a short time frame, so you can show your support by donating and you will also get a multiplayer version of the game.

 The multiplayer version features co-op gameplay with 2 EXTRA NIGHTS that has different difficulty levels. The game is local multiplayer by default, but can still be played online remotely by using 3rd party tools, how to use them are explained in the devlogs under the "Multiplayer Troubleshooting" section.
